title: Map of Ancient Egypt and Nubia - connections

content.prompt: Which of the following statements best describes economic connections within the Egyptian Empire?

choices.label: Merchants in all the regions communicated easily with a common Bantu language.
The cultivation of yams was common along the full length of the Nile.
Nubia was the source of Egyptâ€™s gold and luxury goods.
Nok terracotta was manufactured in multiple regions.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
